item.title: Burnt Basque Cheesecake
item.description: Translation source: 真网红流心巴斯克蛋糕，满满细节，大写好吃！【马壮实Maxkitchen】 Size: 6 inch round cake tin Ingredients Cream Cheese 350g Sugar 90g 2 Eggs + 1 Egg Yolk Cream 150g Low Gluten Flour (Corn Flour works well too!) 10g Method #1 Cream
